publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3645 Roseanna Cunningham: Fair Trade in Schools—That the Parliament welcomes the decision by Perth and Kinross Council to introduce fair trade goods in local schools and congratulates Iain Jarvie of Kinross High School, who initiated the campaign, and all the pupils in schools throughout Perth and Kinross who signed and supported his petition.

S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Christine Grahame*, Rob Gibson*, Mike Pringle*, Bruce Crawford*, Bill Butler*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Donald Gorrie*, Murdo Fraser*, Stewart Stevenson*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr John Swinney*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Campbell Martin*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*

S2M-3645 Roseanna Cunningham: Fair Trade in Schools—That the Parliament welcomes the decision by Perth and Kinross Council to introduce fair trade goods in local schools and congratulates Iain Jarvie of Kinross High School, who initiated the campaign, and all the pupils in schools throughout Perth and Kinross who signed and supported his petition. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Rob Gibson, Mike Pringle, Bruce Crawford, Bill Butler, Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White, Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie, Murdo Fraser, Stewart Stevenson, Eleanor Scott, Mr John Swinney, Michael Matheson, Mr Frank McAveety, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Campbell Martin, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Bruce McFee, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Frances Curran, Carolyn Leckie, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Phil Gallie*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Elaine Smith*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-3645 Fair Trade in Schools (lodged on 28 November 2005) Susan Deacon*
